EmailTemplate.description: JFS -Send "Application Update Submitted" notification to Assigned specialist
EmailTemplate.name: ODJFS Application Update Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Application for Licensure Update Submitted for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_OOS_Program_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have successfully submitted an update to your application for licensure for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_OOS_Program_Number__c}. A copy of the updated application is attached to this email.
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited
